alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer; Harmon; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 12:29AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Roger Mills, northwestern Harmon, northwestern Greer and western Beckham Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1228 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Briscoe to 6 miles east of Wheeler to 5 miles east of Shamrock to near Samnorwood. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sayre, Erick, Reydon, Sweetwater, Texola, and Dempsey. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 0 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
